activities.loc: Richland County Courtroom, Floor C, Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda J. Nelson

records.addlTxt:
11:16 AM Defendant Amanda J. Nelson in court.  Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson in court for Amanda J. Nelson.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. State brings forth the same charges that are listed in the criminal complaint. Attorney Erickson waives the formal reading and stand mute on behalf of  his client. Max penalties stated.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:12 PM Defendant Amanda J. Nelson in court.  Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson in court for Amanda J. Nelson.  Attorney Forehand on behalf of Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Erickson provides the court with a waiver of preliminary hearing. AN agrees to waiving the preliminary hearing. Court binds over for trial. Attorney Forehand asks that we set the arraignment for another time when Attorney Harper is available.
Arraignment scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:59 AM Defendant Amanda J. Nelson in court.  Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson in court for Amanda J. Nelson.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Erickson has received the complaint and waives the formal reading. Max penalties stated. Court sets the preliminary hearing.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:53 PM Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson in court for Amanda J. Nelson. Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant appeared by Zoom. Court inquires as to why Def is not here in person. Def said her internet has been down and wasn't able to get a ride because she was having problems calling out. DA Harper states that the Def did not have leave to appear any way other than in person, noting that the Def is able to appear by phone now. Court resets this matter. DA notes this Def had a prior warrant for a previously-missed appearance; asks for short turn around for adjournment.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
1:53 PM Defendant Amanda J. Nelson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Court speaks about prior hearing where warrant was ordered. Dispatch states that she has called the public defenders office.

01:56 PM - Same appearance. Attorney Wynes appear by zoom. Attorney Harper asks that the bond be reinstated. Court reinstates that bail bond. Max penalties stated.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 31, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Return on warrant on August 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
A.N. does qualify for a public defender but no one has been assigned to her case yet per SPD.

2:02 PM Defendant Amanda J. Nelson not in court.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin.  State speaks about bail bond that had todays date and time. State asks for a warrant. Court orders warrant.

1:04 PM Defendant Amanda J Nelson appeared by video. State appears by Attorney Forehand. 
States asks for a $ 1,000 cash bond. 
AN states that she may be able to post.
Court orders $1,000 cash bond.
Initial set for 07/21/22 at 1:30 PM.
